comment:
* This class manages storage instances used during a package installation session.
 * @hide

methods.name: public static IncrementalFileStorages initialize(Context context, @NonNull File stageDir, @NonNull DataLoaderParams dataLoaderParams, @Nullable IDataLoaderStatusListener statusListener, @Nullable StorageHealthCheckParams healthCheckParams, @Nullable IStorageHealthListener healthListener, List<InstallationFileParcel> addedFiles) throws IOException
methods.comment:
* Set up files and directories used in an installation session. Only used by Incremental.
     * All the files will be created in defaultStorage.
     * TODO(b/133435829): code clean up
     *
     * @throws IllegalStateException the session is not an Incremental installation session.
     * @throws IOException if fails to setup files or directories.

methods.name: private void addApkFile(@NonNull InstallationFileParcel apk) throws IOException
public void startLoading() throws IOException
methods.comment: * Starts or re-starts loading of data.

methods.name: public void cleanUp()
methods.comment:
* Resets the states and unbinds storage instances for an installation session.
     * TODO(b/136132412): make sure unnecessary binds are removed but useful storages are kept

methodNames: public static IncrementalFileStorages initialize(Context context, @NonNull File stageDir, @NonNull DataLoaderParams dataLoaderParams, @Nullable IDataLoaderStatusListener statusListener, @Nullable StorageHealthCheckParams healthCheckParams, @Nullable IStorageHealthListener healthListener, List<InstallationFileParcel> addedFiles) throws IOException
private void addApkFile(@NonNull InstallationFileParcel apk) throws IOException
